vulnerable_road_users.description: a dog on the right side of the road walking in the same direction as the ego car
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: the dog may enter the driving lane, posing a potential hazard

traffic lights.description: a green traffic light visible ahead
traffic lights.explanation: indicates that the ego car has the right-of-way to proceed

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a dog on the right side of the road walking in the same direction as the ego car. This dog may enter the driving lane, posing a potential hazard. Additionally, a green traffic light is visible ahead, indicating that the ego car has the right-of-way to proceed.

1.description and explanation: This is an image of a dog located on the road. The presence of a dog in the road means the driver of the ego car should reduce speed and exercise caution to avoid a collision.

2.description and explanation: This object is identified as a traffic cone. A traffic cone on the road typically indicates areas of caution, such as construction zones or other temporary hazards. The driver should be alert for potential changes in traffic patterns or road conditions ahead.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution due to limited visibility and keep a vigilant watch for the dog on the right that might enter the road. Maintain a slow speed to allow for safe stopping distance and be prepared to stop or maneuver if the dog enters the driving path. Continue driving since the traffic light is green, but be ready to respond to any changes in the traffic conditions.
